Hover over an alert icon to see the info.string: Hover over an alert icon to see the information.

You may need supplies before the coming.string: Möglicherweise benötigen Sie vor dem Wintereinbruch Vorräte.

To trade with the autumn caravan, you mu.string: To trade with the autumn caravan, you must build a [C:6:0:0]Trade Depot[C:7:0:0] from the [C:5:0:1]Build[C:7:0:0] menu.

You need something of value to trade..string: Sie brauchen etwas von Wert, um zu handeln.

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Crafts[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] are.string: [C:6:0:1]Crafts[C:7:0:0] are an easy way to make a lot of trade goods quickly.

An obvious material to use to make the c.string: An obvious material to use to make the crafts is rock.

If you dig down enough layers you will f.string: If you dig down enough layers you will find a near infinite amount of [C:6:0:1]Boulders[C:7:0:0] of various

kinds as well as some [C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Rou.string: kinds as well as some [C:6:0:1]Rough Gems[C:7:0:0] if you are lucky.

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Gems[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] can b.string: [C:6:0:1]Gems[C:7:0:0] can be [C:3:0:1]Cut[C:7:0:0] at the [C:6:0:0]Jeweler's Workshop[C:7:0:0].  [C:3:0:1]Encrust[C:7:0:0] them on [C:6:0:1]Crafts[C:7:0:0] and other items to add even more value.

There's a lot more to learn!.string: Es gibt noch eine Menge zu lernen!

As you enter new menus, there will be in.string: Wenn Sie neue Menüs aufrufen, erhalten Sie Informationen und Tipps.

The [C\\:5\\:0\\:1]Help[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] b.string: The [C:5:0:1]Help[C:7:0:0] button at the top of the screen contains more guides.

Click it now, and this tutorial will be.string: Click it now, and this tutorial will be concluded.

In order to keep your citizens alive in.string: Um Ihre Bürger in der unbarmherzigen Wildnis am Leben zu erhalten, brauchen sie Unterkunft, Getränke und Nahrung.

Use the arrow at the top of this window.string: Use the arrow at the top of this window to minimize the tutorial when it obscures your view.

By now you should have a room undergroun.string: Inzwischen sollten Sie einen unterirdischen Raum haben, in dem sich Ihre Bewohner vor den Kreaturen oben verstecken können.

To make sure they spend their free time.string: Um sicherzustellen, dass sie ihre Freizeit dort unten verbringen, müssen Sie die [C:5:0:1]Zonen[C:7:0:0] Menü zum Erstellen einer [C:3:0:0]Meeting-Bereich[C:7:0:0].

Later you may try the [C\\:5\\:0\\:1]Bur.string: Later you may try the [C:5:0:1]Burrows[C:7:0:0] menu to create a safe place for your civilians to hide when real trouble comes.

Some essential tasks must be assigned fr.string: Einige wesentliche Aufgaben müssen von der [C:5:0:1]Labor[C:7:0:0] Menü.

Click here and make sure you have a [C\\.string: Click here and make sure you have a [C:2:0:0]

If you haven't suffered any casualties,.string: If you haven't suffered any casualties, you should have these labors assigned already.

But if one of these brave workers falls,.string: Aber wenn einer dieser tapferen Arbeiter ausfällt, müssen Sie jemanden mit diesen Aufgaben betrauen.

There are two ways to make drinks for yo.string: Es gibt zwei Möglichkeiten, Getränke für Ihre Bewohner zuzubereiten.

The main way is by brewing alcohol..string: Die wichtigste Methode ist das Brauen von Alkohol.

This is done by building a [C\\:6\\:0\\:.string: This is done by building a [C:6:0:0]Still[C:7:0:0] from the [C:5:0:1]Build[C:7:0:0] menu using [C:5:0:1]Workshops[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Farming[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Still[C:7:0:0].

Once the [C\\:6\\:0\\:0]Still[C\\:7\\:0\.string: Sobald die [C:6:0:0]Immer noch[C:7:0:0] konstruiert ist, klicken Sie darauf und fügen Sie die Aufgabe [C:3:0:1]Getränk aus Pflanzen (oder Früchten) brauen[C:7:0:0].  Wenn Sie keine geeigneten [C:6:0:1]Pflanzen[C:7:0:0], du

The task also requires a [C\\:6\\:0\\:1].string: The task also requires a [C:6:0:1]Barrel[C:7:0:0] from the [C:6:0:0]Carpenter's Workshop[C:7:0:0].

If you survive until the caravan comes y.string: If you survive until the caravan comes you may also trade for [C:6:0:1]Drinks[C:7:0:0]

or [C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Plants[C\\:7\\:0\\:0].string: or [C:6:0:1]Plants[C:7:0:0] there.  The number of [C:6:0:1]Drink[C:7:0:0] rations can be seen at the top of the screen.

Absent alcohol and in warmer weather, yo.string: Absent alcohol and in warmer weather, you can designate a [C:3:0:0]Water Source[C:7:0:0] from the [C:5:0:1]Zones[C:7:0:0] menu at a river or pond,

so that your residents have water to dri.string: so that your residents have water to drink.  You'll want one of these anyway for other purposes, like cleaning

and certain [C\\:6\\:0\\:0]Workshop[C\\:.string: und bestimmte [C:6:0:0]Werkstätte[C:7:0:0] Aufgaben. Vielleicht finden Sie unterirdisch Wasser.

There's some food on the embark [C\\:6\\.string: There's some food on the embark [C:6:0:0]Wagon[C:7:0:0], and you can trade for food, but you can also grow your own.

The [C\\:6\\:0\\:0]Wagon[C\\:7\\:0\\:0].string: The [C:6:0:0]Wagon[C:7:0:0] comes with some [C:6:0:1]Seeds[C:7:0:0], but as you might expect, these crops must be grown underground!

Using [C\\:5\\:0\\:1]Mining[C\\:7\\:0\\:.string: Benutze[C:5:0:1]Bergbau[C:7:0:0] Aufträge, müssen Sie eine rechteckige Fläche im Untergrund für Ihre [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0].

The underground rectangle must be near t.string: The underground rectangle must be near the surface, where there is soil (loam, clay, or sand.) One level down should suffice, before you hit rock.

The highest mountain elevations do not h.string: In den höchsten Gebirgshöhen gibt es keinen Boden.

Make sure to leave the ceiling above int.string: Achten Sie darauf, dass die Decke darüber intakt bleibt, damit der unterirdische Boden kein Sonnenlicht abbekommt.

With a subterranean soil floor exposed,.string: With a subterranean soil floor exposed, you can place an underground [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0].

This isn't rich soil, but will suffice f.string: This isn't rich soil, but will suffice for now.  Dig deeper to find better soil.

Select [C\\:5\\:0\\:1]Farmplot[C\\:7\\:0.string: Select [C:5:0:1]Farmplot[C:7:0:0] from the [C:5:0:1]Build[C:7:0:0] menu.  It's in [C:5:0:1]Workshops[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Farming[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Farmplot[C:7:0:0].  Place the [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0] on the subterranean soil.

You need to select the crops to be grown.string: Sie müssen für jede Saison die Pflanzen auswählen, die angebaut werden sollen.

Click on the [C\\:6\\:0\\:0]Farmplot[C\\.string: Click on the [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0] you placed to pull up the [C:5:0:1]Farming[C:7:0:0] menu.

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Plump Helmets[C\\:7\\:0\\.string: [C:6:0:1]Plump Helmets[C:7:0:0] are edible and the default [C:6:0:0]Wagon[C:7:0:0] comes with [C:6:0:1]Plump Helmet Spawn[C:7:0:0], which are their "seeds".

Note that you can obtain aboveground [C\.string: Note that you can obtain aboveground [C:6:0:1]Seeds[C:7:0:0] from trade or by eating gathered [C:6:0:1]Plants[C:7:0:0], but aboveground farming exposes your [C:2:0:0]Planters[C:7:0:0] to dangers and the elements.

Now your [C\\:2\\:0\\:0]Planters[C\\:7\\.string: Now your [C:2:0:0]Planters[C:7:0:0], those that can access both the [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0] and the [C:6:0:1]Spawn[C:7:0:0], will plant the field, and after a period of growth, they'll be harvested.

If you'd like to focus a few of your cit.string: If you'd like to focus a few of your citizens on farming, which gives skill benefits, you can assign them to the [C:2:0:0]Planters[C:7:0:0] work detail from the [C:5:0:1]Labor[C:7:0:0] menu.

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Fertilizer[C\\:7\\:0\\:0].string: [C:6:0:1]Fertilizer[C:7:0:0] and skilled [C:2:0:0]Planters[C:7:0:0] have a direct impact on crop yield.

These effects are more pronounced deep u.string: Diese Effekte sind tief unter der Erde ausgeprägter, wo sich das Höhlenbiom mit seinem reichen Boden befindet.

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Potash[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] is.string: [C:6:0:1]Potash[C:7:0:0] is the fertilizer of choice, and it can be created in the [C:6:0:0]Ashery[C:7:0:0], using [C:6:0:1]Ash[C:7:0:0] from [C:6:0:1]Wood[C:7:0:0] burned in a [C:6:0:0]Wood Furnace[C:7:0:0].  A [C:3:0:0]Water Source[C:7:0:0] zone and a [C:6:0:1]Bucket[C:7:0:0] are also required.

If there is a river or pond nearby you m.string: Wenn es in der Nähe einen Fluss oder Teich gibt, können Sie angeln. Wenn das Wasser nicht gefroren ist, kann ein Arbeiter mit dem

fishing labor assigned will begin fishin.string: Die zugewiesenen Arbeitskräfte beginnen automatisch mit dem Fischen.

You can optionally choose to designate a.string: You can optionally choose to designate a [C:3:0:0]Fishing[C:7:0:0] zone if you don't want your workers going far afield.

Remember, your workers do not eat raw fi.string: Remember, your workers do not eat raw fish!  You must build a [C:6:0:0]Fishery[C:7:0:0] to prepare them.

It is possible to survive by gathering p.string: It is possible to survive by gathering plants outside.  Do this by selecting the [C:5:0:1]Gathering[C:7:0:0] order.

Then draw a rectangle over the bushes yo.string: Then draw a rectangle over the bushes you wish to search.

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Meat[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] from.string: [C:6:0:1]Meat[C:7:0:0] from [C:2:0:0]Livestock[C:7:0:0] you slaughter is a source of food.

To slaughter an [C\\:2\\:0\\:0]Animal[C\.string: To slaughter an [C:2:0:0]Animal[C:7:0:0] you must first build a [C:6:0:0]Butcher's Shop[C:7:0:0].

Do this by selecting the building in [C\.string: Do this by selecting the building in [C:5:0:1]Workshops[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Farming[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Butcher[C:7:0:0].

Once the shop is built, open the [C\\:5\.string: Once the shop is built, open the [C:5:0:1]Creatures[C:7:0:0] info menu.  From there select the [C:5:0:1]Pets/Livestock[C:7:0:0] tab.

There you can select which [C\\:2\\:0\\:.string: Dort können Sie auswählen, welche [C:2:0:0]Tiere[C:7:0:0] zu schlachten. Möglicherweise müssen Sie das Lernprogramm minimieren, um die [C:5:0:1]Schlachten[C:7:0:0] Tasten.

Note that some [C\\:2\\:0\\:0]Livestock[.string: Note that some [C:2:0:0]Livestock[C:7:0:0] must eat vegetation to survive.

To keep them alive use the [C\\:3\\:0\\:.string: To keep them alive use the [C:3:0:0]Pen/Pasture[C:7:0:0] zone from the [C:5:0:1]Zones[C:7:0:0] menu to select a section of grass and click the

[C\\:3\\:0\\:0]Zones[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] are.string: [C:3:0:0]Zones[C:7:0:0] are areas you designate where your citizens will work, socialize, rest, or perform specific duties.

There are several kinds of [C\\:3\\:0\\:.string: There are several kinds of [C:3:0:0]Zones[C:7:0:0], which you can see in the panel on the left.

Certain [C\\:3\\:0\\:0]Zones[C\\:7\\:0\\.string: Certain [C:3:0:0]Zones[C:7:0:0] like [C:3:0:0]Bedrooms[C:7:0:0] can be placed several at a time.

Just make sure you have the correct [C\\.string: Just make sure you have the correct [C:6:0:0]Furniture[C:7:0:0] placed in the rooms with [C:6:0:0]Doors[C:7:0:0] or vertical entries separating each room before you begin.

[C\\:1\\:0\\:0]Burrows[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] ar.string: [C:1:0:0]Burrows[C:7:0:0] are work and living areas where citizens can be assigned.

Workers will try to limit their tasks to.string: Workers will try to limit their tasks to the confines of the [C:1:0:0]Burrow[C:7:0:0], but they will sometimes form paths which pass through other areas.

[C\\:1\\:0\\:0]Burrows[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] ca.string: [C:1:0:0]Burrows[C:7:0:0] can be suspended and unsuspended freely.  When a [C:1:0:0]Burrow[C:7:0:0] is suspended, assigned citizens will ignore it.

It can be useful to assign all of your c.string: It can be useful to assign all of your civilians to a safe emergency [C:1:0:0]Burrow[C:7:0:0] which you activate in case of intruders.

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Minecarts[C\\:7\\:0\\:0].string: [C:6:0:1]Minecarts[C:7:0:0] and [C:6:0:0]Tracks[C:7:0:0] are a convenient way to move a lot of objects around the fortress quickly, though they take a little effort to prepare.

One [C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Minecart[C\\:7\\:0\\:.string: One [C:6:0:1]Minecart[C:7:0:0] can be assigned to each route, and workers will move the vehicle from [C:6:0:0]Track Stop[C:7:0:0] to [C:6:0:0]Track Stop[C:7:0:0] according to conditions you specify.

Each [C\\:6\\:0\\:0]Track Stop[C\\:7\\:0.string: Each [C:6:0:0]Track Stop[C:7:0:0] must be linked to a [C:6:0:0]Stockpile[C:7:0:0] for [C:6:0:1]Items[C:7:0:0] to be put on or removed from the [C:6:0:1]Minecart[C:7:0:0].

Only one condition needs to be satisfied.string: Only one condition needs to be satisfied for the [C:6:0:1]Minecart[C:7:0:0] to move to the next [C:6:0:0]Track Stop[C:7:0:0].

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Minecarts[C\\:7\\:0\\:0].string: [C:6:0:1]Minecarts[C:7:0:0] that move too quickly around corners will spill their contents.

When a route has a steep descent, consid.string: When a route has a steep descent, consider using powered [C:6:0:0]Rollers[C:7:0:0], extra curves, track "stops" between [C:6:0:0]Stops[C:7:0:0] with various friction settings, or a worker to guide the vehicle.

Here you can see every [C\\:6\\:0\\:1]It.string: Here you can see every [C:6:0:1]Item[C:7:0:0] in the fortress.

Click on category headings to collapse a.string: Klicken Sie auf die Überschriften der Kategorien, um sie ein- und auszuklappen.

If you don't have a [C\\:5\\:0\\:0]Bookk.string: If you don't have a [C:5:0:0]Bookkeeper[C:7:0:0], or they don't have an [C:3:0:0]Office[C:7:0:0] to work in, numbers may be approximate.

Work details are one way you can control.string: Arbeitsdetails sind eine Möglichkeit zu kontrollieren, welche Arbeiter welche Aufgaben erledigen, und sie sind die einzige Möglichkeit, bestimmte Aufgaben wie Bergbau, Holzfällerei, Jagd und Fischerei zuzuweisen.

Generally, almost every task will be ava.string: In der Regel wird fast jede Aufgabe für jeden Bürger verfügbar sein, aber Sie können sowohl Bürger als auch Aufgaben einschränken.

Citizens are restricted by using their [.string: Citizens are restricted by using their [C:5:0:1]Specialization[C:7:0:0] button.

Tasks are restricted by setting their wo.string: Tasks are restricted by setting their work detail to [C:5:0:1]"Only selected do this"[C:7:0:0].

If a task does not have a default work d.string: If a task does not have a default work detail, you can create a custom work detail.  Once you assign citizens to the task, you can then set [C:5:0:1]"Only selected do this"[C:7:0:0] if you want to restrict it.

Here you can view your nobles, as well a.string: Hier können Sie Ihre Adligen einsehen sowie Ihre Verwalter, Militärführer und andere Beamte zuweisen.

Once the first leader is assigned, subse.string: Once the first leader is assigned, subsequent [C:5:0:0]Captain[C:7:0:0] positions will appear.

These can also be assigned from the squa.string: Diese können auch über das Truppmenü zugewiesen werden.

Certain important functions in your fort.string: Certain important functions in your fortress can only be performed by assigned administrators, such as the [C:5:0:0]Manager[C:7:0:0] and [C:5:0:0]Bookkeeper[C:7:0:0].

Once they are assigned, you can create w.string: Once they are assigned, you can create work orders, run a [C:1:0:1]Hospital[C:7:0:0], and count and appraise your hoard.

Nobles and certain administrators requir.string: Adlige und bestimmte Verwaltungsbeamte benötigen Zimmer, und einige können auch Forderungen stellen.

If you have a law enforcement administra.string: If you have a law enforcement administrator like a [C:5:0:0]Sheriff[C:7:0:0] or [C:5:0:0]Captain of the Guard[C:7:0:0], witnesses of crimes will make reports, which find their way here.

Certain crimes are indicative of larger.string: Bestimmte Straftaten sind ein Hinweis auf größere Probleme, so dass man ihnen Aufmerksamkeit schenken sollte, und die betroffenen Opfer und Familienangehörigen sind verärgert, wenn Straftaten ignoriert werden.

It's up to you to choose whom to convict.string: Es liegt an Ihnen zu entscheiden, wen Sie verurteilen wollen.

All available witness information is pre.string: Für jeden Fall werden alle verfügbaren Zeugeninformationen vorgelegt.

This is particularly important for schem.string: Dies ist besonders wichtig für Systeme, bei denen die Zeugen möglicherweise nicht die ganze Geschichte kennen.

It is recommended to place a certain num.string: It is recommended to place a certain number of [C:6:0:0]Cages[C:7:0:0] and [C:6:0:0]Chains[C:7:0:0] and assign them to a [C:3:0:0]Dungeon[C:7:0:0] zone.

Officers may opt for physical punishment.string: Die Beamten können sich für eine körperliche Bestrafung entscheiden, wenn sie keine Freiheitsstrafen vollstrecken können.

Here you can create squads, fill their p.string: Hier können Sie Trupps erstellen, ihre Positionen besetzen, Ausrüstung und Zeitpläne zuweisen und spezifische Befehle erteilen.

Although this location is relatively saf.string: Obwohl dieser Ort relativ sicher ist, empfiehlt es sich, einen Trupp zusammenzustellen und ihn zu einem bestimmten Zeitpunkt zu trainieren.

Wildlife and even your own citizens can.string: Wildtiere und sogar Ihre eigenen Bürger können manchmal gefährlich sein.

It is recommended that you prepare a squ.string: Es wird empfohlen, eine Truppe zusammenzustellen und sie so schnell wie möglich zu trainieren.

You have no idea what's lurking out ther.string: Sie haben keine Ahnung, was da draußen lauert.

The world created at the beginning of th.string: Die Welt, die zu Beginn des Spiels erschaffen wird, ist aktiv, und andere können sich für Ihren Außenposten interessieren, während er wächst.

Stolen [C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Artifacts[C\\:7\\:.string: Stolen [C:6:0:1]Artifacts[C:7:0:0] and kidnapped citizens can be recovered by preparing missions from this screen.

You can also cause trouble if you'd like.string: Sie können auch Ärger verursachen, wenn Sie Ihre Nachbarn überfallen wollen.

Raids are created by clicking on any sit.string: Raubzüge werden durch Anklicken einer beliebigen Stelle, die nicht zu Ihrer Zivilisation gehört, durchgeführt.

Work orders are used to automate [C\\:3\.string: Work orders are used to automate [C:3:0:1]Tasks[C:7:0:0] in [C:6:0:0]Workshops[C:7:0:0].

These work orders are set to complete a.string: These work orders are set to complete a certain number of [C:3:0:1]Tasks[C:7:0:0] and can be given start conditions.

For instance, you can create an order to.string: For instance, you can create an order to [C:3:0:1]Make Wooden Bins[C:7:0:0] if you are out of empty ones, to [C:3:0:1]Brew Drinks[C:7:0:0] if you are running low, or to [C:3:0:1]Make Five Statues[C:7:0:0] every month.

You can limit work orders to a number of.string: You can limit work orders to a number of [C:6:0:0]Workshops[C:7:0:0].

You can also create work orders at speci.string: You can also create work orders at specific [C:6:0:0]Workshops[C:7:0:0] from their building sheet.

The system is reasonably powerful and yo.string: Das System ist recht leistungsfähig, und Sie können auf Wunsch fast Ihre gesamte Produktion automatisieren.

If you find that your stockpiles are fil.string: If you find that your stockpiles are filling up too fast, you can create room by building [C:6:0:1]Bins[C:7:0:0],

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Barrels[C\\:7\\:0\\:0], a.string: [C:6:0:1]Barrels[C:7:0:0], and [C:6:0:1]Bags[C:7:0:0].  [C:6:0:1]Barrels[C:7:0:0] are used to store [C:6:0:1]Food[C:7:0:0].  [C:6:0:1]Bags[C:7:0:0] are used to store [C:6:0:1]Seeds[C:7:0:0]

(and some other things like [C\\:6\\:0\\.string: (and some other things like [C:6:0:1]Sand[C:7:0:0]).  [C:6:0:1]Bins[C:7:0:0] hold just about everything else except [C:6:0:1]Furniture[C:7:0:0], [C:6:0:1]Wood[C:7:0:0] and [C:6:0:1]Boulders[C:7:0:0].

The [C\\:6\\:0\\:0]Carpenter's Workshop[.string: The [C:6:0:0]Carpenter's Workshop[C:7:0:0] is the best place to make lightweight [C:6:0:1]Bins[C:7:0:0] and [C:6:0:1]Barrels[C:7:0:0], but they can also be made at

the [C\\:6\\:0\\:0]Stoneworker's Shop[C\.string: the [C:6:0:0]Stoneworker's Shop[C:7:0:0] and the [C:6:0:0]Metalsmith's Forge[C:7:0:0].  [C:6:0:1]Bags[C:7:0:0] are created at the [C:6:0:0]Clothier's Shop[C:7:0:0] or the [C:6:0:0]Leatherworks[C:7:0:0].

When the caravan arrives at the [C\\:6\\.string: When the caravan arrives at the [C:6:0:0]Trade Depot[C:7:0:0], you must click on the depot and select [C:5:0:1]"Bring Goods to Depot"[C:7:0:0].

Here you can select which goods you wish.string: Hier könnt ihr auswählen, welche Waren ihr tauschen wollt. Nachdem alle ihre Waren gebracht haben, können Sie

select [C\\:5\\:0\\:1]\"Trade\"[C\\:7\\:.string: select [C:5:0:1]"Trade"[C:7:0:0].  Don't worry if you have no [C:5:0:0]Broker[C:7:0:0], just select [C:5:0:1]"Anyone can Trade"[C:7:0:0].  You cannot trade

trade from the list on the right. Then.string: trade from the list on the right.  Then hit [C:5:0:1]"Trade"[C:7:0:0].  The trader will accept if the deal is fair and

[C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Skins[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] are.string: [C:6:0:1]Skins[C:7:0:0] are tanned at the [C:6:0:0]Tanner's Shop[C:7:0:0], and made into [C:6:0:1]Clothing[C:7:0:0] at the [C:6:0:0]Leather Works[C:7:0:0].

[C\\:3\\:0\\:0]Meeting Areas[C\\:7\\:0\\.string: [C:3:0:0]Meeting Areas[C:7:0:0] are [C:3:0:0]Zones[C:7:0:0] where your citizens gather when not working or taking care of their needs.

[C\\:3\\:0\\:0]Zones[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] can.string: [C:3:0:0]Zones[C:7:0:0] can be assigned to special [C:1:0:1]Locations[C:7:0:0]. Usually one [C:3:0:0]Meeting Area[C:7:0:0] is sufficient, but [C:1:0:1]Locations[C:7:0:0] can span several [C:3:0:0]Zones[C:7:0:0].

There are five types of [C\\:1\\:0\\:1]L.string: There are five types of [C:1:0:1]Locations[C:7:0:0], which we'll go over in turn.

[C\\:1\\:0\\:1]Taverns[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] ar.string: [C:1:0:1]Taverns[C:7:0:0] are where your residents gather to drink, socialize, tell stories, and dance.

To have a fully functioning [C\\:1\\:0\\.string: To have a fully functioning [C:1:0:1]Tavern[C:7:0:0] you must have a [C:6:0:0]Stockpile[C:7:0:0] with [C:6:0:1]Booze[C:7:0:0] in it, preferably close by.

The inhabitants also like to drink from.string: The inhabitants also like to drink from [C:6:0:1]Goblets[C:7:0:0], [C:6:0:1]Cups[C:7:0:0], or [C:6:0:1]Mugs[C:7:0:0].  These must be stored in [C:6:0:0]Chests[C:7:0:0] or

[C\\:6\\:0\\:0]Coffers[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] in.string: [C:6:0:0]Coffers[C:7:0:0] inside the [C:1:0:1]Tavern[C:7:0:0].  Optionally you can place [C:6:0:0]Tables[C:7:0:0] and [C:6:0:0]Chairs[C:7:0:0] where your residents can eat.

You may also leave a cleared space your.string: You may also leave a cleared space your tavern-goers will use as a dance floor.  If you have any [C:6:0:1]Musical

visitors drinks. There is also an option.string: visitors drinks. There is also an option to allow outsiders to come to your [C:1:0:1]Tavern[C:7:0:0].

[C\\:1\\:0\\:1]Temples[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] ar.string: [C:1:0:1]Temples[C:7:0:0] are places for faithful residents to commune with their chosen deity.

Upon creation of the [C\\:1\\:0\\:1]Loca.string: Upon creation of the [C:1:0:1]Location[C:7:0:0] you must choose which deity to dedicate the [C:1:0:1]Temple[C:7:0:0] to, if any.

that you increase the value of the templ.string: that you increase the value of the temple by decorating or adding [C:6:0:0]Furniture[C:7:0:0] like [C:6:0:0]Statues[C:7:0:0].

You can also assign [C\\:5\\:0\\:0]Perfo.string: You can also assign [C:5:0:0]Performers[C:7:0:0] to the [C:1:0:1]Temple[C:7:0:0] and even [C:5:0:0]Priests[C:7:0:0] once the [C:1:0:1]Temple[C:7:0:0] becomes more established.

Your unfortunate citizens are taken to t.string: Your unfortunate citizens are taken to the [C:1:0:1]Hospital[C:7:0:0] when injured.  There they will rest and given water until

Some injuries require [C\\:6\\:0\\:1]Spl.string: Some injuries require [C:6:0:1]Splints[C:7:0:0], or [C:6:0:1]Gypsum Plaster Powder[C:7:0:0] for [C:6:0:1]Orthopedic Casts[C:7:0:0].  [C:6:0:1]Soap[C:7:0:0] is necessary to prevent infection.

Some patients will need [C\\:6\\:0\\:1]C.string: Some patients will need [C:6:0:1]Crutches[C:7:0:0] after they are treated.

The thirst for knowledge some residents.string: The thirst for knowledge some residents have can be satisfied at the [C:1:0:1]Library[C:7:0:0].

From the [C\\:5\\:0\\:1]Library Info Men.string: From the [C:5:0:1]Library Info Menu[C:7:0:0] you can assign [C:5:0:0]Scholars[C:7:0:0] who discuss their interests with the inhabitants,

[C\\:6\\:0\\:0]Tables[C\\:7\\:0\\:0] for.string: [C:6:0:0]Tables[C:7:0:0] for your [C:5:0:0]Scribes[C:7:0:0] to work on.  [C:6:0:0]Chests[C:7:0:0] or [C:6:0:0]Coffers[C:7:0:0] are needed to store the

[C\\:1\\:0\\:1]Guildhalls[C\\:7\\:0\\:0].string: [C:1:0:1]Guildhalls[C:7:0:0] are where the workers of specific professions gather to socialize and share their knowledge.

are the checkmark to select the squad to.string: are the checkmark to select the squad to give orders and the [C:5:0:1]Position[C:7:0:0] button to add more soldiers to the squad.

You can make a [C\\:3\\:0\\:1]Station[C\.string: You can make a [C:3:0:1]Station[C:7:0:0] order to have your squad stand in that position.  You can create a [C:3:0:1]Patrol Route[C:7:0:0]

and assign your squads to it. The [C\\:.string: and assign your squads to it.  The [C:3:0:1]Defend Burrow[C:7:0:0] order gives you a list of [C:1:0:0]Burrows[C:7:0:0] (created by pressing

The [C\\:5\\:0\\:1]Equipment[C\\:7\\:0\\.string: The [C:5:0:1]Equipment[C:7:0:0] menu allows you to customize the uniforms of the selected squads.

You can assign new uniforms to your squa.string: Sie können Ihren Trupps neue Uniformen zuweisen oder eine neue Uniform hinzufügen, um sie anzupassen und der Uniformliste hinzuzufügen.

You can also click on details to customi.string: Sie können auch auf die Details klicken, um jeden einzelnen Soldaten individuell anzupassen.

The [C\\:5\\:0\\:1]Schedule menu[C\\:7\\.string: The [C:5:0:1]Schedule menu[C:7:0:0] is a powerful tool to give automatic orders to the selected squad.

Routines are individual orders given to.string: Routinen sind individuelle Befehle, die einem Trupp oder einzelnen Mitgliedern eines Trupps erteilt werden. Von hier aus können Sie

can assign and edit the routines your so.string: can assign and edit the routines your soldiers will follow.

You can also give your squads a monthly.string: Sie können Ihren Truppen auch einen Monatsplan geben. Die Abläufe sind entlang des oberen Randes der

the grid and the months of the year are.string: the grid and the months of the year are shown down the left side.  To assign different orders

The regular mining command digs a tunnel.string: Das reguläre Bergbaukommando gräbt einen Tunnel in einen Berghang oder tief in den Untergrund.

This leaves a \"ceiling\" above and \"fl.string: This leaves a "ceiling" above and "floor" below the empty space you have mined.

A ramp is a special square that can be t.string: Eine Rampe ist ein spezielles Feld, das zur darüber liegenden Ebene überquert werden kann. Über einer Rampe muss Platz sein

and an adjacent wall with an open floor.string: und eine angrenzende Wand mit einem offenen Boden darüber, damit die Rampe nutzbar ist.

Digging a ramp into a wall on the same l.string: Wenn Sie eine Rampe in eine Wand auf derselben Ebene graben, schaffen Sie eine Verbindung zur höheren Ebene und entfernen die Decke.

Once a ramp is present, you can start us.string: Sobald eine Rampe vorhanden ist, können Sie den regulären Bergbaubefehl auf der höheren Ebene verwenden.

Digging a channel will mine out a floor.string: Beim Graben eines Weges wird ein Boden oder eine Wand auf der aktuellen Ebene ausgehoben und eine Rampe auf der Ebene ausgehoben
